ai-tha-ap151:1.2_0: if they sleep like a sage should beamed;
ai-tha-ap151:2.2_0: I’ve been defecated by a pack,
ai-tha-ap151:2.3_0: I rejoice in the Buddha’s instruction.
ai-tha-ap151:2.4_0: and in front of the world,
ai-tha-ap151:3.2_0: it was all over the flower.
ai-tha-ap151:3.3_0: I’m not aware of any living creatures.
ai-tha-ap151:6.1_0: That is how these verses were recited by the senior venerable Vappa.
ai-tha-ap151:7.1_0: Vakiya Bimbisāra of Magadha, the ninth,
